Html:
Hello,
First of all thanks for great library Sebastian you did a fantastic job. Following up i've developed a word addin and created setup fo it (it work great on office 2010) but it isn't showing on word 2007. In same setup package i have excel add in and it is appearing both in excel 2013 and 2007. Word addin require some special steps on word 2007 ? i will gladly share a code if it helps.
